DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate clinical benefit safety OrCel treatment venous ulcer . OrCel standard care compare standard care alone . Standard care consist currently accept compression therapy . Patients treat 12 week . Patients heal ulcer follow additional 12 week assess durability heal wound .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Bilayered Cellular Matrix ( OrCel ) Treatment Venous Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Any race , 18 85 year age Male female Chronic venous insufficiency Ulcer size 2 20 sq cm , inclusive Ulcer present least one month ABI > 0.7 Decrease wound size > 35 % Screening Phase Infection ulcer site Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus Previous treatment exclude medication
